product_name: Adventure Maps Methow Valley Trail Map
long_description: Accurate and easy to read, the Methow Valley trail map covers the best biking, hiking and skiing that north central Washington State has to offer. Researched and explored by the map makers, each trail is described in detail so you can plan a perfect day of outdoor adventure. Durable map paper is waterproof and won't wear out at the folds. Features lat./lon. and UTM coordinate gridlines for convenience, as well as selected lat./lon. waypoints. Includes seasonal weather data and sunrise/sunset times charts; NAD 83 map datum, scale 1:100,000. Shaded relief shows elevation contours in an easy-to-read fashion; ranger district contact information helps you check local conditions. Copyright 2012, Adventure Maps, Inc.
short_description: Accurate and easy to read, the Methow Valley trail map covers the best biking, hiking and skiing that north central Washington State has to offer.
